content.question:
If <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>→</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> </munder> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mn>7</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbeaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiGacYgacaGGPbGaaiyBaaWcpaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOK H4QaaG4maaWdaeqaaOWdbiaadAgadaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiEaaGaay jkaiaawMcaaiabg2da9iaaiEdaaaa@4265@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, which of the following must be true?

I. f is continuous at x = 3

II. f is differentiable at x = 3

III. f(3) = 7
